attributes.action: ban new drivers from driving cars above 1.2 litres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year 17 year olds pass their test and immediatley jump into very powerful cars and more often or not have an accident that results in death or serious injury.
I would like a new law that prevents new drivers from driving such vehicles and be limited to 1.2 litres with required test passes for higher cc cars with a minimum time limit of 3 years before such test is allowed.
This will reduce the number of boy racers and will reduce the number of deaths on our roads.
